programme.title: Ender's Game
programme.desc: After an alien invasion, an unlikely recruit commands Earth's forces and fights for the future of humanity.

programme.title: Divergent
programme.desc: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: Tris must confront her inner demons and fight against an alliance which threatens to tear her society apart.

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: ALLEGIANT takes Tris and Four into a new world, far more dangerous than ever before.

programme.title: Notorious Nick
programme.desc: A mixed martial arts fighter born with a partial left arm battles for his unstoppable desire to succeed.

programme.title: American Fighter
programme.desc: A young wrestler competes in the world of underground fighting to raise money for his ailing mother.

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: Kurt must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

programme.title: Kickboxer 2: The Road Back
programme.desc: David has given up competition and is running a kickboxing school until his brother's murderer shows up.

programme.title: Kickboxer 3: The Art of War
programme.desc: David Sloan travels to Rio for a kick-box exhibition. There he saves two youngsters and stops a white slaver.

programme.title: Kickboxer 4: The Aggressor
programme.desc: David Sloan must travel to Mexico to save his wife from a savage drug lord who's also an old nemesis.

programme.desc: A mixed martial arts fighter born with a partial left arm battles for his unstoppable desire to succeed.
